name: Football Liege
description:
Slavic Game Jam 2018. Theme: COMPETITION.

What will happen if you mix the football and knights' tournament together. Only one way to find out ;)

Graphics: Ann

Developers: Cortez, DeathTost

Controls: W/A/D or Arrow Keys to move your horse and rider.

The goal is to score 3 points, but you can also ram your opponent :)
